alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Collier County through 430 PM EDT... At 400 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Vineyards, or near Golden Gate Estates, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Naples, Golden Gate Estates, Orangetree, Big Corkscrew Island, Vineyards, Golden Gate, North Naples, Corkscrew Swamp Sanctuary and Quail Creek Estate. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County
